meanings.definition: A person who has an extreme or irrational fear of heights.
meanings.sent1: The acrophobe refused to go near the edge of the cliff.
meanings.sent2: The acrophobe always avoids tall buildings and mountains.
meanings.sent3: The acrophobe joked that they would rather swim with sharks than climb a ladder.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of heights turned her into an acrophobe, unable to enjoy the beauty of skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: The acrophobe's heart raced as they looked down from the top of the tower.
